By default, your query won't have any scheduling but it's super easy to adjust!

In the bottom left corner, you'll see the schedule area:

Clicking ' Never ' will open a picker for "every x" or at a specific time of day. Note: The time you set the scheduling of queries is based on the timezone of the computer you're using to set it (then it's translated to UTC).

Once a schedule is set, your query will run automatically as instructed to run.

Scheduled Queries with Parameters

When running queries with parameters on a schedule the scheduler will use the default parameter values for the query execution.
